document.full_text: u.s. prosecutors agreed on wednesday to allow two of the three internet gambling companies named in a $3 billion fraud suit to reopen their websites, partly to let customers withdraw their money.
document.title: u.s. allows 2 of 3 shuttered poker sites to reopen
lines_and_colors: u.s. prosecutors agreed on wednesday to allow two of the three internet gambling companies named in a $3 billion fraud suit to reopen their websites, partly to let customers withdraw their money.
